Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2012 08:19AM sjoyg3 wrote: This thread has been so helpful. I too am waiting and jumping to the worst case scenario. My Biopsy is Friday, and have already decided it was bad, so am trying to think positive, My husband and I have been very lucky in life and that luck will hopefully shine, but I keep saying to myself, it was only a matter of time for bad news. I am especially grateful for "leafs'" post, it helps to know my dome and gloom thoughts are normal.....
Posts.Title: Scared and feeling unlucky chrissera marjie

Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2012 08:15PM sjoyg3 wrote: how did it go? I am scheduled Friday, waited to get the results from a previous mammo, and now after week one, i think i may go crazy waiting til Friday, and have to wait for results too! Sending good wishes your way! Hope your results are B(!
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Biopsy thoeting sjoyg3
